steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"70u4h","text":"To purify NIX-GST, fuse the cytosol-exposed domain of NIX (1-182aa) to a C-terminal GST-tag through cloning into a pET-DUET1 vector (available from Addgene). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2dlum","text":"Introduce the point mutants in vitro mutagenesis to generate NIX E72A/L75A/D77A/E81A (4A; ΔWIPI2) (available from Addgene), and NIX W35A/L38A (ΔLIR) (available from Addgene).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
